reactor.io.net.tcp.spec

Class TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.spec.DispatcherComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>
      • reactor.bus.spec.EventRoutingComponentSpec<TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>,TcpClient<IN,OUT>>
        • reactor.io.net.tcp.spec.TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be received by the client
    OUT - The type that will be sent by the client
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<TcpClient<IN,OUT>>

    public class TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>
extends EventRoutingComponentSpec<TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>,TcpClient<IN,OUT>>
    A helper class for specifying a TcpClient
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin
